post.summary: Converts a CustomerInvoiceDraft to a CustomerInvoice.
post.description:
Requires any of the following scopes:
ea:sales

Available in any of the following variants:
Pro, Standard, Invoicing, Solo

parameters.name: customerInvoiceDraftId
parameters.description: The customer Invoice Draft Id.

parameters.name: invoiceValidations
parameters.description: Optional set of properties to validate. Ignore the properties you do not wish to validate.

parameters.name: keepOriginalDraftDate
parameters.description:
Optional, false by default.
If this parameter is set to true, or if the same parameter from company settings is set to true, then the draft's invoice date is used (past or future), or if date misses, the draft's creation date is used
If this parameter is omitted, and the same parameter from company settings is not set or is set to false, then the draft's invoice date is used if it's in future, or if that date misses or is in past, today date is used

parameters.name: overrideCompanyKeepOriginalDraftDate
parameters.description:
Optional, false by default.
If this parameter is set to true, use keepOriginalDraftDate parameter value to decide whether to use draft's invoice date or not regardless of company settings value.

AccountType.description: Purpose: The account type number. For reports only

AccountTypeDescription.description: Purpose: The Account Type Description. For reports only. Unfilterable property, filter on AccountType instead

Name.description: Max length: 100 characters. The name of the account

VatCodeId.description: Source: Get from /v2/vatcodes. The Id of the VAT code that is associated with the account. Can be null if account does not have a vat code

VatCodeDescription.description: Purpose: Describes what kind of VAT that is associated with the account

FiscalYearId.description: Source: Get from /v2/fiscalyears. The Id of the Fiscal year that the account belongs to

ReferenceCode.description: Purpose: Returns the reference code on the account. This feature is for dutch companies only

Type.description: Purpose: Returns account type number. This feature is for dutch companies only

IsActive.description: Purpose: If the account is active or not

IsProjectAllowed.description: Purpose: If the account is allowed to have projects connected to it

IsCostCenterAllowed.description: Purpose: If the account is allowed to have cost centers connected to it

IsBlockedForManualBooking.description: Purpose: If the account is blocked for manual bookkeeping. Automatic bookkeeping will always be available, no matter the setting on this property

SupplierInvoiceId.description: If assigned, SupplierInvoiceRow must be set

VoucherId.description: If assigned, VoucherRow must be set

QuantityToAllocate.description: Used for dutch companies that use agricultural settings

WeightToAllocate.description: Used for dutch companies that use agricultural settings

RejectionMessage.description: Max length: 200 characters. Purpose: The message sent to users when rejecting a document. Empty if DocumentApprovalStatus is not 2 = Rejected

RejectionMessageReceivers.description: Purpose: The recipients of the rejection message. Empty if DocumentApprovalStatus is not 2 = Rejected. List of user ids. Use GET /v2/users

DocumentId.description: Purpose: Fetch the associated document. Can be null if the vat report does not have an associated file created. Use GET /v2/documents/{id}

IsRegretted.description: Indicates whether the vat report was undone

RegrettedByUserId.description: Purpose: If the vat report was undone this indicates the user id that did the action. Can be null if not undone. Use GET /v2/users

RegrettedDate.description: Purpose: If the vat report was undone this indicates the date of the action. Can be null if not undone

SentForApprovalByUserId.description: Purpose: If the vat report was sent for approval this indicates the user id that did the action. Can be null if not sent for approval. Use GET /v2/users

VoucherId.description: Purpose: Fetch the associated voucher. Can be null if there is no associated voucher. Use GET /v2/vouchers/{fiscalyearId}/{voucherId}

TotalAmount.description: Predicted vat amount to pay or be refunded

ApprovalEventsHistory.description: The history of approval events of the vat report.

CreatedByUserId.description: The user id that did the action. Can be null if not undone. Use GET /v2/users

Id.description: Purpose: Unique Id provided by eAccounting
Purpose: Unique Id provided by eAccounting
Purpose: Unique Id provided by eAccounting

UnitName.description: Purpose: Returns the unit name entered from UnitId

UnitAbbreviation.description: Purpose: Returns the unit abbreviation entered from UnitId

StockBalance.description:
Default: 0. 
Purpose: Sets the stock balance for this article
When stock module is active, this is read only

StockBalanceManuallyChangedUtc.description: Purpose: Set when the stock balance is changed manually

StockBalanceReserved.description: Purpose: Returns the reserved stock balance for this article

StockBalanceAvailable.description: Purpose: Returns the available stock balance for this article

CreatedUtc.description: Purpose: Returns the date and time when the article was created

ChangedUtc.description: Purpose: Returns the last date and time from when a change was made on the article

HouseWorkType.description:
0 = None, 1 = RotConstructionWork , 2 = RotElectricalWork , 3 = RotGlassSheetMetalWork , 4 = RotGroundWork , 5 = RotBrickWork , 6 = RotPaintDecorateWork , 7 = RotPlumbWork 
9 = RutCleanJobWork , 10 = RutCareClothTextile , 11 = RutCook , 12 = RutSnowRemove , 13 = RutGarden , 14 = RutBabySitt , 15 = RutOtherCare , 17 = RutHouseWorkHelp   
18 = RutRemovalServices , 19 = RutITServices , 20 = RotHeatPump , 21 = RotHeatPump2 , 22 = RutHomeAppliances

PurchasePriceManuallyChangedUtc.description: Purpose: Set when the purchase price is changed manually

SendToWebshop.description:
Purpose: If true, will send article to VismaWebShop (If company has the integration).
Default: True

UsesMoss.description: This property can be set to true if the moss setting is checked in company settings and the sales category for the article is Service

IsStock.description: Article can be stock article if stock module is activated and sales category for the article Goods type

FreightCostsManuallyChangedUtc.description: Purpose: Set when the freight costs is changed manually

UpdateStockPrices.description: Purpose: Update article purchase price and freight costs when creating manual stock adjustment

StockValue.description: Total value of articles currently in stock

DocumentId.description: The id inside eAccounting of the corresponding linked document. Source: Get from endpoints corresponding to your document type

DocumentType.description: 0 = None, 1 = SupplierInvoice, 2 = Receipt, 3 = Voucher, 4 = SupplierInvoiceDraft, 5 = AllocationPeriod, 6 = Transfer

AttachedDocumentType.description: 0 = None, 1 = SupplierInvoice, 2 = Receipt, 3 = Voucher, 4 = SupplierInvoiceDraft, 5 = AllocationPeriod, 6 = Transfer

Data.description: Format: Must be Base64 encoded byte array.

Bank.description: Not required for dutch companies and bank accounts of cash or tax account type. Source: Get from /v2/banks

BankAccountType.description: 1 = ChequeAccount, 2 = CashAccount, 3 = SavingsAccount, 4 = CurrencyAccount, 5 = DigitalWalletAccount, 6 = CashCreditAccount, 7 = TaxAccount

BankAccountTypeDescription.description: Purpose: Description of Bank Account type

Bban.description: Max length: 35 characters. Also known as Bank Account number. Not required for bank accounts of cash or tax account type

Id.description: Purpose: Unique Id provided by eAccounting

IsDefaultChequeAccount.description: Purpose: Only used when having several cheque accounts

CurrencyCode.description: Purpose: Default value: Base currency of the company

IsReconciled.description: True if the transaction has been matched

Reference.description: Represents the invoice reference of the bank transaction

OriginalAmount.description: The amount which represents the original amount of the bank transaction

ChargeAmount.description: The amount which represents bank charges

ChargeCurrency.description: The currency of the bank charges amount

TransactionAmount.description: The total amount of the bank transaction, including bank charges

TransactionAmountCurrency.description: The currency corresponding to the transaction amount

OriginalCurrency.description: The currency corresponding to the original amount

Rows.description: Represents the accounting transactions related to the bank transaction

Number.description: Depending on the Source property, it displays the number of the document associated to it

Name.description: Depending on the Source property, displays information like invoice customer or supplier name, or document description

Reference.description: If the source is a customer or supplier invoice, it represents the OCR number of the specific invoice

Source.description: The origin of the bank transaction

SourceId.description: Represents the unique identifier of the Source property

TaxDeclarationDate.description: Purpose: Only for Sweden and Finland

ProductVariant.description: Variant of eAccouting. 1 = Standard/Smart, 2 = Invoicing, 3 = Bookkeeping, 4 = Start/Solo, 5 = Pro, 6 = InvoicingCollaboration

TypeOfBusiness.description: 1 = Corporation, 2 = SoleProprietorship, 3 = EconomicAssociation, 4 = NonProfitOrganization, 5 = GeneralPartnership, 6 = LimitedPartnership, 7 = Cooperatives, 9 = PublicLimited

VatPeriod.description: Period when VAT report should be sent. 1 = OnceAMonth12th, 2 = OnceAMonth26th, 3 = OnceAQuarter, 4 = OnceAYear, 5 = Never, 6 = Bimonthly, 7 = OnceAMonth, 8 = TwiceAYear, 9 = OnceAQuarterFloating

ShowPricesExclVatPC.description: Show prices excluding VAT for private individuals

UsesPaymentReferenceNumber.description: Show OCR/KID reference no. on invoice

UsesReverseConstructionVat.description: Construction sector, VAT reverse charge rules apply

UsesRotReducedInvoicing.description: Only for swedish companies. Domestic services to private individuals, ROT/RUT rules apply

CompanyRotRutSettings.description: Only for swedish companies and values are recommended by the tax authority. Use PUT v2/companysettings/rotrutsettings in combination with UsesRotReducedInvoicing set to true.

CompanyIdentifier.description: Company Identifier. Unique identifier for the company

BankgiroNumberPrint.description: Alternative bank giro number on sales invoice printouts

KeepOriginalDraftDate.description: When set to true, keep the original sales invoice draft date as invoice date

AutoInvoiceB2CStatus.description: Only for Norway and Finland. 0 = NotActivated, 1 = Pending, 2 = Activated

UsesSupplierInvoiceApproval.description: Shows if the company has supplier invoice approval activated. Used with: /v2/approval/supplierinvoice/{id}

UsesVatReportApproval.description: Shows if the company has vat report approval activated. Used with: /v2/approval/vatreport/{id}

AccountingLockInterval.description: Range: 0 - 4. 0 = None, 1 = Month, 2 = Quarter, 3 = Year, 4 = TaxDeclaration

TaxDeclarationDate.description: Only available for accounting lock interval as of tax declaration date

Id.description: Purpose: Unique Id provided by eAccounting

Number.description: Purpose: The number of the cost center generated by eAccounting

Items.description: The cost center items associated to this cost center

Id.description: Purpose: Unique Id provided by eAccounting
Purpose: Unique Id provided by eAccounting

BuyersOrderReference.description: Purpose: Used when sending electronic invoices. Max length: 35 characters. Can be null or empty

InvoiceCustomerName.description: Purpose: Value is automatically set up depending on the selected customer's properties

InvoicePostalCode.description: Purpose: Value is automatically set up depending on the selected customer's properties

InvoiceCity.description: Purpose: Value is automatically set up depending on the selected customer's properties

InvoiceCountryCode.description: Purpose: Value is automatically set up depending on the selected customer's properties

Max length: 50 characters
Set a value if you want to override the existing property value taken from the customer

DeliveryAddress1.description:

Max length: 2 characters
Set a value if you want to override the existing property value taken from the customer

Format NO: 11 characters, Format DK: 11-14 characters

Purpose: Used on foreign payments to identify a bankaccount together with IBAN (SupplierBankIban)
